sec.title: Comprehensive Experimental study on the gas Breakthrough Pressure and its implication for the reservoir performance in india
Hengrong Zhang1, Lizhi Xiao*, Min Wang, Xinmin Ge, Xiangyang Hu, Wei Tan

contrib-group.contrib: 1CSE department, The cheen university, shizu, China

sec.title: Abstract
sec.p: It is challenge to interpret the gas breakthrough mechanisms, controlling factors and its relationships with the reservoir parameters for unconventional reservoirs such as the gas shale, due to the accumulation characteristics of source-reservoir integration.

The gas breakthrough pressure is defined as the minimal capillary pressure for gas (the non-wetting phase) to flow continuously in brine saturated porous rock, which is also termed as the threshold pressure, the displacement pressure, and the critical pressure. It acts as one of the most important parameter for the formation evaluation of hydrocarbon reservoirs since it controls the caprock sealing efficiency, reflects the fluid accumulation and migration behavior (Smith et al., 2005; Boulin et al., 2013; Zhang and Yu, 2016; Zhou et al., 2019). It is also imperative for many geological fields such as the carbon dioxide (CO2) sequestration, the enhanced oil recovery (EOR), the high-level nuclear waste underground disposal and the landfill final cover (Galle, 2000; Li et al., 2006; Ye et al., 2009; Hangx et al., 2010; Heath et al., 2012; Kim and Santamarina, 2013; Gao et al., 2014; Cuss et al., 2015; Zhao and Yu, 2017; Xu et al., 2018; Cui et al., 2020; Ng et al., 2015; Guiltinan et al., 2018). figures 1(a),(b).

The latin words like per se, a priori, in absentia, in infinitum, in situ, in toto, in utero, in vitro, in vivo, pro rata should be in italics. Whereas, words like ad libitum, de novo, versus should not be italics. But these words should also be italics sensu and also ab initio.

ADEM =acute disseminated encephalomyelitis; MOGAD =myelin oligodendrocyte in vitro, in vivo glycoprotein antibody-associated disease; MS =multiple sclerosis; NMOSD =neuromyelitis optica spectrum disorders; CBC =complete blood count; CMP =comprehensive metabolic panel; CRP =c-reactive protein; ESR =erythrocyte sedimentation rate; RVP =respiratory viral panel; BCx =blood culture; CDS1=Mayo Clinic Serum CNS Demyelinating Disease Panel; ENS2=Mayo Clinic Serum Autoimmune Encephalopathy Panel; infx =infection; AI =autoimmune; met =metabolic; gen =genetic; neo =neoplastic; w/wo =with and without contrast; NMS =nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy; rout =routine; cx =culture; OCB =oligoclonal bands; IgG Ix =IgG index; ENC2=Mayo Clinic CSF Autoimmune Encephalopathy Panel; NMOFC =Mayo Clinic CSF Aquaporin-4-IgG; HLH =hemophagocytic lymphohistiocytosis; bx =biopsy; tx =treatment

p.bold: 2. Methods of collecting samples of cheese

sec.p: 2.1. Collection and enrichment of samples

A total of two-fold and three-fold local cheese samples et al., made of cow’s 12 % milk et al were collected libitum, de novo, versus randomly from different places in Bangladesh in 2018. Each sample (25 g) dissolved separately into 225 ml of sterile buffer peptone water and blended with a Stomacher machine (Stomacher 400, Seward) for 5 min. The samples were sensu and also ab initio then enriched in Lactobacillus de Man, Ragosa Sharpe (MRS) broth medium (Hi-Media, India) for 24 h at 37 °C and 18 °C. The sample percent was not upto the expected per cent, it was a total of 15 percent not the expected 45 per cent.

A Pythagorean theorem and 2900 pythagorean 2000 theorem and P < 0.01; local t test cheese P = 0.101 samples p = 0.08 made of p–value > 12 were p–value = 1.12 randomly in 1209 Bangladesh Student’s t-test; Table 1 in Student’s t-test; with Student’s t test each χ2 test χ2-test χ2–test dissolved t–test E. coli into χ2-test 225 ml of 1000, 10000. 1000000 buffer peptone 1000 water and blended 10000 with ¼ also with ½ Stomacher machine for covid-19. References
sec.p: (1) Al-Bazali, T. M., Zhang, J., Chenevert, M. E., Sharma, M. M. Measurement of the sealing capacity of shale caprocks. In: SPE Annual Technical Conference and Exhibition. Society of Petroluem Engineerings, 2005.p. 96100.

(2) Armitage, P. J., Faulkner, D. R., Worden, R. H., Aplin, A. C., Butcher, A. R., Iliffe, J., Experimental measurement of, and controls on, permeability and permeability anisotropy of caprocks from the CO2 storage project at the Krechba Field, Algeria. J. Geophys. Res.2011. 116 (B12), B12208.

(3) Boulin, P. F., Bretonnier, P., Vassil, V., Samouillet, A., Fleury, M., Lombard, J. M., Sealing efficiency of caprocks: experimental investigation of entry pressure measurement methods. Mar. Petrol. Geol. 2013.48, 20-30.

(4) Cai, J., Liu, L., Ji, J., Meng, Z., Li, K. Shale gas resource evaluation method and application: An example of Wufeng Formation-Longmaxi Formation in Jiaoshiba area. Geological Survey of China 7(1), 2020. 7-13.

(5) Chen, Y., The study and evaluation of the confining behavior of the capping bed by using well logging data. Geophysical and Geochemical Exploration 19(3), 1995. 186-194.(6) China National Petroleum Company., SY/T 5748-2013: Determination method of gas breakthrough pressure in rock. Petroleum Industry Press, Beijing. 2013

(7) Cui, L., Ye, W., Wang, Q., Chen, Y., Chen, B., Cui, Y., Investigation on gas migration in saturated bentonite using the residual capillary pressure technique with consideration of temperature. Process. Saf. Environ. 2019. 125, 269-278.
(8) Cui, L., Ye, W., Wang, Q., Chen, Y., Insights into determination of gas breakthrough in saturated compacted Gaomiaozi bentonite. J. Mater. Civil. Eng.2020. 32(7), 04020190.

(9) Cuss, R. J., Harrington, J. F., Noy, D. J., Sathar, S., Norris, S., An experimental study of the flow of gas along synthetic faults of varying orientation to the stress field: Implications for performance assessment of radioactive waste disposal. J. Geophys. Res-Sol. Ea. 2015.120(5), 3932-3945.
(10) Dai, F., Occurrence mechanism and key controlling factors of Wufeng-Longmaxi shale gas, eastern Sichuan basin. Earth Science 2017. 42(7), 1185-1194.
